00024 #include "TruncatedLorentzianParameters.hpp"
00025 #include "util/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace pwiz::util;
00031 using namespace pwiz::peaks;
00032 
00033 
00034 ostream* os_ = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 void testParameterConversion()
00038 {
00039     TruncatedLorentzianParameters tlp;
00040     tlp.f0 = 666;
00041     tlp.alpha = complex<double>(100);
00042     double shift = 666;
00043     double scale = 50;
00044 
00045     ublas::vector<double> p = tlp.parameters(-shift, 1/scale);
00046     unit_assert(p(TruncatedLorentzian::AlphaR) == 2); 
00047     unit_assert(p(TruncatedLorentzian::AlphaI) == 0); 
00048     unit_assert(p(TruncatedLorentzian::Tau) == 1); 
00049     unit_assert(p(TruncatedLorentzian::F0) == 0); 
00050    
00051     ublas::vector<double> p2(4);
00052     p2(TruncatedLorentzian::AlphaR) = 3;
00053     p2(TruncatedLorentzian::AlphaI) = 0;
00054     p2(TruncatedLorentzian::Tau) = 0;
00055     p2(TruncatedLorentzian::F0) = 1;
00056 
00057     tlp.parameters(p2, shift, scale); 
00058     unit_assert(tlp.alpha == 3.*scale);
00059     unit_assert(tlp.tau == 0);
00060     unit_assert(tlp.f0 == 1+shift);
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void testIO()
00065 {
00066     TruncatedLorentzianParameters tlp;
00067     tlp.T = 2;
00068     tlp.tau = 3;
00069     tlp.f0 = 666;
00070     tlp.alpha = complex<double>(100);
00071 
00072     const char* filename = "TruncatedLorentzianTest.test.tlp";
00073     tlp.write(filename);
00074     TruncatedLorentzianParameters tlp2(filename);
00075 
00076     unit_assert(tlp2.T == tlp.T);
00077     unit_assert(tlp2.tau == tlp.tau);
00078     unit_assert(tlp2.f0 == tlp.f0);
00079     unit_assert(tlp2.alpha == tlp.alpha);
00080 
00081     ostringstream command;
00082     command << "rm " << filename;
00083     system(command.str().c_str());
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 void testEquality()
00088 {
00089     TruncatedLorentzianParameters tlp;
00090     TruncatedLorentzianParameters tlp2;
00091 
00092     tlp.f0 = 666;
00093     unit_assert(tlp != tlp2);
00094     tlp2.f0 = 666;
00095     unit_assert(tlp == tlp2);
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 void testSamples()
00100 {
00101     TruncatedLorentzianParameters tlp;
00102     tlp.T = 2;
00103     tlp.tau = 3;
00104     tlp.f0 = 666;
00105     tlp.alpha = complex<double>(100);
00106 
00107     double start = 660;
00108     double step = .2;
00109     int count = 60;
00110 
00111     tlp.writeSamples(cout, start, step, count);
00112 }

00115 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00116 {
00117     try
00118     {
00119         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00120         if (os_) *os_ << "TruncatedLorentzianParametersTest\n";
00121         testParameterConversion();
00122         testIO();
00123         testEquality();
00124         //testSamples();
00125         return 0; 
00126     }
00127     catch (exception& e)
00128     {
00129         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00130         return 1;
00131     } 
00132 }
